title: ðŸš¨ Jaguars fire Doug Marrone, could they now target Urban Meyer? - Emergency Podcast (Football 1/4)
description:
A few seasons ago, Doug Marrone had the Jaguars on the doorstep of the Super Bowl. Now, he's without a job. Jacksonville decided to part ways with Marrone on Monday morning, so Will Brinson and John Breech gathered to break it down on the latest emergency podcast. The guys look back at his up-and-down tenure, before looking ahead to his replacement. Urban Meyer is a name that is gaining a lot of steam, but does he make the most sense? Brinson and Breech offer other potential suitors with an emphasis on truly offensive-minded coaches.Â 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â
